subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Defensive tackle Ndamukong Suh of the Lions had said he was not going after the knees of Minnesota Vikings center John Sullivan on Sunday during an interception return by Detroit’s DeAndre Levy.
snippet: Defensive tackle Ndamukong Suh of the Lions had said he was not going after the knees of Minnesota Vikings center John Sullivan on Sunday during an interception return by Detroit’s DeAndre Levy.
